required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Outcome of Proximal Humerus Fractures :Anatomic Neck Fractures vs Surgical Neck Fractures
clinical_study.source: Zhoupu Hospital, Pudong New Area, Shanghai, China

brief_summary.textblock: From April ,2014 to April 2015,31 patients with fractures of the proximal humerus were treated in our hospital. According to anatomic neck fractures (ANF) and surgical neck fractures (SNF), we divided the patients into two groups. All the patients were followed at least 1 year.

primary_outcome.measure: change of head-shaft angle at 12months from 6months in two groups

secondary_outcome.measure: change of Offset at 12months from 6months in two groups
Constant-Murly scores at 3 months, 12 months and last follow-up
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 months,12 months,last follow-up (last follow-up means recent evaluation before database lock, it is more than 12months )

secondary_outcome.measure: change of the distance between the screw tip and the subchondral surface(TSD) at 12months from 6months in two groups

clinical_study.condition: Internal Fixation; Complications, Mechanical, Bones of Limb

arm_group.description: anatomic neck fractures of proximal humerus
surgical neck fractures of proximal humerus

intervention.intervention_name: Locking plates were used for proximal humeral fractures.

study_pop.textblock: From May ,2013 to April 2015, patients with fractures of the proximal humerus who were treated with locking plate.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
-From May ,2013 to April 2015, patients with fractures of the proximal humerus who were treated with locking plate.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients had pathologic fractures,
- Patients had previous surgery on the affected shoulder,
- Patients were treated with shoulder arthroplasty.
- Patients were treated with intramedullary nail.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Zhoupu Hospital, Pudong New Area, Shanghai, China
